title: Poster, 1973
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On crème background, a midnight-blue toned black-and-white photograph of a man in a wide-brimmed cowboy hat, his lips accentuated in lipstick-red and sensuous like a woman's. Starting top center, the inscriptions: "DUSTIN HOFFMAN / w filmie amerykanskim nagroozonym OSKAREM / NOCNY KOWBOJ / rezyseria: / JOHN SCHLESINGER /  w pozostalych rolach: / john voight, sylvia miles, / brenda vaccaro". And at lower left: "produkcia: jerome hellman / -- united artists".

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1973.
1973. Offset lithograph on wove paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-103.
